title.rendered: Fatima Zohra Filali Idrissi. The Oriental Fashion Show. FW 22-23

content.rendered:
Fatima Zohra Filali Idrissi. The Oriental Fashion Show. FW 22-23 

Moroccan elegance

Originally from Fez, Morocco, Fatima Zohra studied management and communication, and then began working in the design and fabric industry. After a long experience, she discovered a new passion for fashion and decided to open her own workshop, dedicated to the traditional Moroccan dress.

She creates a unique and majestic style, ingeniously combining modernity and elegance and offers authentic and exclusive fabrics. Fine velvet and silk fabrics are enhanced by harmonious lines. A sober and definitely elegant style.

Thanks to her original imprint, the talented Fatima-Zohra has given Moroccan style a completely different perspective by creating precious and exclusive clothes.

Fatima-Zohra chose the Oriental Fashion Show to make her first appearance on the international fashion scene, and has become a reference in Morocco and in the world of traditional Moroccan caftan. She dresses stars, princesses and women of the world.


By Fashion Editor 24FashionTV: Christina V Henningstad
